subject: Discrimination
Blacks
Basketball
lead_paragraph: When the Clippers’ 126-121 victory over the Warriors was complete, sealing a tense first-round series victory, it was a cathartic moment for an organization in the wake of a scandal surrounding its owner.
snippet: When the Clippers’ 126-121 victory over the Warriors was complete, sealing a tense first-round series victory, it was a cathartic moment for an organization in the wake of a scandal surrounding its owner.
